org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.impl

Class ClusterConnectionBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.impl.BridgeImpl
      • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.impl.ClusterConnectionBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.SendAcknowledgementHandler, org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.SessionFailureListener, org.apache.activemq.core.remoting.FailureListener, org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent, Bridge, Consumer

    public class ClusterConnectionBridge
extends BridgeImpl
    A bridge with extra functionality only available when the server is clustered.

    Such as such adding extra properties and setting up notifications between the nodes.

    Author:
    tim, Clebert Suconic, Martyn Taylor
